titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Southold, N.Y. subscription list 1977.622
titlestmt.author: Matthew Gorham
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was originally processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-12-18 20:59:08 +0000.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.abstract: A photostat copy of a 1786 list of Southold, N.Y. residents and money they contributed to build a wharf in Southold Harbor.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. The item was formally accessioned in 1977.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection consists of a single document.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Southold, N.Y. subscription list, 1786, 1977.622, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was rehoused and the finding aid revised by Dee Bowers in 2023.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: A photostat copy of a 1786 list of Southold, N.Y. residents and money they contributed to build a wharf in Southold Harbor. The list features 35 names.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: While many items at the Center for Brooklyn History are unrestricted, we do not own reproduction rights to all materials. Be aware of the several kinds of rights that might apply: copyright, licensing and trademarks. The researcher assumes all responsibility for copyright questions.
